name: HOT CROSS
subtitle: Hot Cross is an extensive multi-chain and cross-chain tool suite.

name: CAKE
subtitle: PancakeSwap is the leading decentralized exchange on BNB Smart Chain.
description: PancakeSwap is the leading decentralized exchange on BNB Smart Chain, with the highest trading volumes in the market. Low fees. Decentralized. And fun. PancakeSwap is the people's choice on BNB Smart Chain.

name: FRONT
subtitle: Frontier is a chain-agnostic DeFi aggregation layer.
description: Frontier is a chain-agnostic DeFi aggregation layer. With our applications, users can participate in protocol tracking and management, staking, best-rate asset swapping, liquidity provision, CDP creation & monitoring, and more.

name: GUM
subtitle: Gourmet Galaxy is an innovative Yield Farming platform, a combination of DeFi and NFTs in a gaming experience.
description: Gourmet Galaxy is an innovative Yield Farming platform, a combination of DeFi and NFTs in a gaming experience.

name: MARSH
subtitle: Unmarshal is a multi-chain DeFi data network aiming to deliver granular, reliable & real-time data to dApps.
description: Unmarshal is a multi-chain DeFi data network aiming to deliver granular, reliable & real-time data to dApps. Unmarshal Indexes data on multiple chains and serves data in multiple formats such as APIs, Push notifications, Websockets, Insights and Analytics.

name: MARSH
subtitle: Unmarshal is a multi-chain DeFi data network aiming to deliver granular, reliable & real-time data to dApps.
description: Unmarshal is a multi-chain DeFi data network aiming to deliver granular, reliable & real-time data to dApps. Unmarshal Indexes data on multiple chains and serves data in multiple formats such as APIs, Push notifications, Websockets, Insights and Analytics.

name: ZEE
subtitle: ZeroSwap is a multi-chain compatible decentralised exchange aggregator focused on making gasless transactions possible with zero fees.
description: ZeroSwap is a multi-chain compatible decentralised exchange aggregator focused on making gasless transactions possible with zero fees. One of the core utilities of ZEE is to reduce friction in fundraising using digital assets; to solve that, we built a Dex Offering Platform Called — ZeeDO

name: BUSD
subtitle: BUSD is a U.S.-regulated stablecoin, fully backed by U.S. dollars: 1 BUSD = $1.00 USD.
description: BUSD is a U.S.-regulated stablecoin, fully backed by U.S. dollars: 1 BUSD = $1.00 USD. BUSD offers faster ways to fund your trades and is acceptable as a medium of exchange, store of value, and method of payment across the global crypto ecosystem.

name: WBNB
subtitle: BNB powers the Binance Ecosystem and is the native coin of the Binance Chain and the BNB Smart Chain.
description: BNB powers the Binance Ecosystem and is the native coin of the Binance Chain and the BNB Smart Chain. Wrapped BNB (WBNB) is a token on BNB Smart Chain where the price is pegged to BNB at a rate of 1 WBNB = 1 BNB. WBNB is used in many dApps on the BNB Smart Chain.

name: GUM
subtitle: Gourmet Galaxy is an innovative Yield Farming platform, a combination of DeFi and NFTs in a gaming experience.
description: Gourmet Galaxy is an innovative Yield Farming platform, a combination of DeFi and NFTs in a gaming experience.

name: HAKA
subtitle: AI-powered NFT & DeFi funding platform that is backed by Risk-Adjusted Returns On Crypto.
description: The first-ever AI-powered NFT & DeFi funding platform that is backed with an exclusive technology RAROC (Risk-Adjusted Returns On Crypto). Also an NFT, lending, borrowing, saving, and credit risk platform that offers a wide range of innovative crypto finance products.

name: KYTE
subtitle: KYTE offers the community an opportunity to earn incentives, stake, and back projects on its platform.
description: KYTE is Kambria's DeFi product. KYTE is focused on offering the community an opportunity to earn incentives, stake, and back projects on its platform, as well as yield farm.

name: ODDZ
subtitle: Oddz is a Multi- chain option trading platform that expedites the execution of call and put options contracts, Perpetual conditional trades, and futures.
description: It employs the synergies of Ethereum, BNB Smart Chain, Elrond, Polygon and Polkadot to unleash the potential decentralized derivatives market. It focuses on building solutions that can propel the DeFi ecosystem by simplifying derivatives trading and enhancing the user experience.

name: BANANA
subtitle: ApeSwap is a leading decentralized exchange (DEX) on BNB Smart Chain and Polygon focused on offering a premier trading experience.
description: ApeSwap is a leading decentralized exchange (DEX) on BNB Smart Chain and Polygon focused on offering a premier trading experience. Users are incentivized to pool liquidity on ApeSwap through yield farming to earn the native currency, $BANANA.

name: WBNB
subtitle: BNB powers the Binance Ecosystem and is the native coin of the Binance Chain and the BNB Smart Chain.

name: MCRN
subtitle: MacaronSwap allows users to be Liquidity Provider, Farming, Staking, Exchange, Bridging Assets across chains and more.
description: MacaronSwap is a decentralized Cross-Chain Farm-Staking and Exchange Platform. MacaronSwap uses an automated market maker (AMM) model.

name: UNO
subtitle: Decentralized reinsurance risk-trading platform.
description: Uno Re is the world’s first decentralized reinsurance risk-trading platform powered by PolkaDot. Uno Re will allow the community to invest and trade in ‘risk’ and receive sizable returns on their investments while also allowing the community to propose innovative insurance products to the space, thus propelling a new generation of Insurtech companies powered by the UnoRe ecosystem.

name: TOON
subtitle: Cross-Chain Liquidity Mirror Protocol, One-click liquidity mirroring across ETH, BSC, HECO Chain, xDAI, POLYGON
description: Pontoon offers users one-click liquidity mirroring across Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Avax, HECO Chain, xDAI, Optimism etc with an Incentivised Relayer Network and Liquidity Mining for liquidity providers participating across chains. Pontoon aims to reduce the fragmented liquidity across chains and address the lack of trustless decentralized interoperability among cross-chain DeFi protocols

name: SHILL
subtitle: Project SEED is a GameFi Metaverse Ecosystem built by an AAA Game Studio that develops a mobile-focused blockchain gaming.
description: Project SEED is a GameFi Metaverse Ecosystem built by an AAA Game Studio that develops a mobile-focused blockchain gaming that utilizes Multi-Chain Hybrid Technology and integrates Game Hub, GameFi, DAO, ESports, and Growth Program. Aiming to revolutionize the gaming industry by introducing traditional gaming industry standards into the blockchain gaming ecosystem, Project SEED integrates all GameFi functions within the application, making the experience seamless for the players

name: KALA
subtitle: Kalata is a derivatives trading platform based on BSC, allowing everyone to gain on-chain exposure to a vast range of assets.
description: KALATA is the backbone of Synthetic Asset issuance and transaction agreements, allowing everyone to have a smooth experience of real world financial assets. Kalata will built on BNB Smart Chain with higher performance, lower transaction costs and a higher degree of customization. KALATA is also a derivative trading and mortgage lending platform for decentralized synthetic assets.

subtitle: RankerDAO is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that enables its vast guild of gamers.
